name: Dizzy's Game Package
description:
Hey there!

I'm Dizzy and I make various games. Most people support me by making monthly pledges on patreon (https://www.patreon.com/DizzyDice), and in return, they get monthly demos and sneak peeks at projects I'm working on.

Sometimes, though, people miss a pledge, which means they miss out on some of those demos. This page exists so that those people can still manually snag a copy of the latest builds so they don't miss out!

Here's what's in this month's package:

  • Solar Scope 0.1.3
  • Tale of Rin 0.1.0
  • Tiki Cave Adventure 1.0.0

    • Also check out my website Lombergames.com for more info!
